<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TM.getSubtargetImpl()-&gt;isVulkanEnv()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1  Simplify loop for subsequent transformations. After this steps, loops</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// have the following properties:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - loops have a single entry edge (pre-header to loop header).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - all loop exits are dominated by the loop pre-header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - loops have a single back-edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aeb7682c55116e253e95fcd05564a3c3b">createLoopSimplifyPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 Removes registers whose lifetime spans across basic blocks. Also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// removes phi nodes. This will greatly simplify the next steps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a298985cd6a2cff3108156659a3d8e4e4">createRegToMemWrapperPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3 Merge the convergence region exit nodes into one. After this step,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// regions are single-entry, single-exit. This will help determine the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// correct merge block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac29a69003e698e7dff3cb8681bdc8191">createSPIRVMergeRegionExitTargetsPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 4 Structurize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a089700341b0cfa4edf89dae2cc1eaa5e">createSPIRVStructurizerPass</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 5 Reduce the amount of variables required by pushing some operations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// back to virtual registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
